title: Identify cause of P rise, Q fall for normal good

content.question: If a normal good is produced in a competitive market, which of the following combination of events could cause the price of the good to increase and the quantity to decrease?

choices.label: An increase in the average income of consumers and an increase in the number of producing firms
An increase in the average income of consumers and an increase in the price of a variable input
An increase in the price of a substitute good an an increase in the number of producing firms
A decrease in the number of consumers and a decrease in the price of a variable input
A decrease in the average income of consumers and an increase in the number of producing firms

content.answer: An increase in the average income of consumers and an increase in the price of a variable input
